message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,300,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to save as much money as I can. What do you think?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,300,000 is still a bit below what I'm hoping to get.  I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000. This is a good deal for both of us, as it's still well below what the product is worth to you.
I understand you're trying to get as much as you can, but I'm not willing to go above $1,320,000. I really need to save some money on this purchase. What do you think?
